title.en: Akari wa Yukihime ni Naritai -Nekura na Hikikomori ga Vtuber ni Natta Riyuu-

description.en: Yukihime is the center of the popular Vtuber unit "Holokiss" but one day she disappears, leaving a note behind that says "Don't come looking for me." The fledgling agency is on the verge of bankruptcy! The president ponders and remembers that Yukihime has a twin sister. However, her twin sister is a reclusive idol-otaku who has nothing in common with Yukihime.
